name: TapRPG2
description:
Hack, slash, collect loot, upgrade weapons, and level up your stats in this sequal RPG.
After Golden Knight destroyed your homeland, you set out to find him, get some answers, and exact your revenge.

A mysterious side-kick joins you in this battle.

Battle is all about reflex, learning attack patterns and timing. Watch for enemies to signal they are about to attack and call your side-kick to rush in and defend. Then hack away with your sword bringing down the monster.
